item.title: 关税倒计时，交易员战战兢兢：市场综述
item.description: 周三，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布全面征收关税的倒计时阶段，亚洲的交易商们将为如何定位自己而苦恼。【原文：Asian traders will be grappling with just how to position themselves on Wednesday in the countdown to President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs announcement.】

item.title: 特朗普将在周三会议上权衡出售 TikTok 的计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于周三召开会议，考虑从中国母公司字节跳动有限公司剥离 TikTok 美国业务的提议，而此时距离出售这款流行社交媒体应用的最后期限还有几天时间。【原文：President Donald Trump will meet on Wednesday to consider a proposal for divesting TikTok’s US operations from Chinese parent company ByteDance Ltd., just days ahead of a deadline for a sale of the popular social media app, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 雪佛龙、YPF 等石油钻井商支持阿根廷新管道建设
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）、YPF SA 和其他石油钻探商正计划在阿根廷铺设一条大型输油管道，以输送瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩地区不断增加的产量。【原文：Chevron Corp., YPF SA and other oil drillers are planning a major Argentine pipeline to handle rising output from the Vaca Muerta shale region.】

item.title: 随着收入增长，稳定币发行商 Circle 公开申请 IPO
item.description: Circle Internet Group Inc.公开提交了期待已久的首次公开募股申请，这家稳定币提供商的收入稳步增长。【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc. filed publicly for a long-awaited initial public offering, with the stablecoin provider showing steadily increasing revenue.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会与温克艾沃斯的双子座信托基金探讨诉讼 "解决方案
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会告诉纽约联邦法官，它希望 "探讨 "对温克艾沃斯双胞胎的双子座信托公司加密货币交易所（Gemini Trust Co.【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission told a federal judge in New York it wants to “explore a potential resolution” of its enforcement suit against the Winklevoss twins’ Gemini Trust Co. cryptocurrency exchange.】

item.title: 亚太地区并购增长超过美国和欧洲，银行家在亚太地区获益匪浅
item.description: 竞争远未结束，但亚太地区今年的交易活动比美国和欧洲快得多。【原文：The race is far from over, but the Asia Pacific has come out of the blocks much faster than the US and Europe in dealmaking activity this year.】

item.title: 共和党人呼吁撤销拜登时代的非银行监管指南
item.description: 众议院金融服务委员会的共和党人敦促美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）废除拜登时代的一项措施，该措施为监管机构提供了一条将非银行金融公司置于更严格监管之下的途径，并称该措施在改善风险监控方面收效甚微。【原文：House Financial Services Committee Republicans urged US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent to rescind a Biden-era measure that gave regulators a pathway for placing nonbank financial firms under greater oversight, saying it did little to improve risk monitoring.】

item.title: 芝加哥学区同意教师最低加薪 16
item.description: 芝加哥的垃圾级公立学区与教师工会达成了一份临时合同，其中包括第一年加薪 4%，结束了长达数月的谈判。【原文：Chicago’s junk-rated public school district and its teachers union have agreed to a tentative contract that includes a 4% pay increase in the first year, ending months of negotiations.】

item.title: 获得特朗普特赦的庞氏骗局策划者在新的欺诈案中被定罪
item.description: 联邦陪审员判定一名新泽西男子犯有欺诈和洗钱罪，此前他因庞氏骗局被判 24 年监禁，唐纳德-特朗普总统在其第一任期内为其减刑。【原文：Federal jurors convicted a New Jersey man on fraud and money laundering charges after his previous 24-year prison sentence over a Ponzi scheme was commuted by President Donald Trump in his first term.】

item.title: 交易员押注特朗普贸易战将加剧国债反弹
item.description: 期权交易商押注国债将延续涨势，因为全球都在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）于 4 月 2 日宣布其互惠关税计划的细节。【原文：Options traders are betting that Treasuries will extend their rally as the world braces for President Donald Trump to announce the details of his reciprocal tariff plans on April 2.】

item.title: Bracebridge Capital 将为 Hooters 提供破产贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Bracebridge Capital 是将向 Hooters of America 提供破产贷款的贷款方之一，以帮助该连锁店为破产保护程序提供资金。【原文：Bracebridge Capital is among the lenders that will provide a bankruptcy loan to Hooters of America to help fund the chain’s Chapter 11 process, according to people with knowledge of the matter that asked not to be identified because they’re not authorized to discuss the matter publicly.】

item.title: 千禧年、Citadel 2025 年跌幅扩大，三月波动剧烈
item.description: 伊兹-英格兰德（Izzy Englander）的千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）和肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的花旗集团（Citadel）上季度在唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战中亏损，而其他对冲基金却获得了收益。【原文：Izzy Englander’s Millennium Management and Ken Griffin’s Citadel lost money last quarter amid President Donald Trump’s trade wars, even as other hedge funds gained.】

item.title: 加拿大同名作物面临中美双重关税威胁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三将对加拿大油菜籽征收全面互惠关税，这将动摇需求，加拿大油菜籽可能是损失最大的作物。【原文：Canadian canola might be the crop with the most to lose from President Donald Trump’s sweeping reciprocal tariffs due Wednesday that are set to shake up demand.】

item.title: 阿波罗和花旗集团为出售波音公司股份提供廉价私人债务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. and Citigroup Inc. are offering a razor-thin rate for a private financing worth around $3.5 billion backing Boeing Co.’s carveout of navigation unit Jeppesen, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Meta 即将推出的价值 1000 多美元的带屏幕智能眼镜将如何工作？
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司正在加紧开发其广受欢迎的豪华版智能眼镜，计划在眼镜中加入手势控制功能和用于显示照片和应用程序的屏幕。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., ramping up work on a deluxe version of its popular smart glasses, plans to include hand-gesture controls and a screen for displaying photos and apps.】

item.title: 机构冻结资金，普林斯顿考虑出售 3.2 亿美元债券
item.description: 普林斯顿大学在本周二发给投资者的通知中说，该校正考虑在本月晚些时候出售 3.2 亿美元的应税债券。【原文：Princeton University is considering selling $320 million of taxable bonds later this month, the school said in a notice to investors dated Tuesday.】

item.title: 体育公园发起人被控诈骗 2.8 亿美元市政债券
item.description: 亚利桑那州一家体育场馆倒闭，市政债券持有人损失超过 2.8 亿美元，一名前小联盟棒球运动员及其父亲被控欺诈。【原文：A former minor-league baseball player and his father were charged with fraud over the failure of an Arizona sports complex that cost municipal bondholders more than $280 million.】

item.title: 特朗普支持的美国比特币开采企业希望上市
item.description: 美国比特币公司（American Bitcoin Corp.）是 Hut 8 公司与包括美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的两个儿子在内的投资者集团本周宣布成立的一家加密货币采矿合资企业，该公司计划最终上市并寻求更多私人资本。【原文：American Bitcoin Corp., the crypto mining venture announced this week between Hut 8 Corp. and an investor group that includes two sons of US President Donald Trump, plans to eventually go public as well as to seek additional private capital.】

item.title: 洛杉矶地区城市销售税全美最高，超过西雅图
item.description: 在本周二生效的投票倡议之后，南加州两个城市的销售税税率之和在全美大辖区中位居第一。【原文：Two Southern California cities now claim the highest combined sales tax rates in the US among large jurisdictions following ballot initiatives that went into effect on Tuesday.】

item.title: 卢特尼克家族的 BGC 集团以 3.25 亿美元收购经纪公司 OTC
item.description: 亿万富翁卢特尼克家族控制的金融公司 BGC Group Inc. 以 3.25 亿美元现金收购了经纪公司 OTC Global Holdings，以扩大其在能源和大宗商品领域的业务。【原文：BGC Group Inc., a financial firm controlled by the billionaire Lutnick family, bought brokerage OTC Global Holdings for $325 million in cash to expand its presence in energy and commodities.】

item.title: 阿波罗为私人投资者提供费用奖励以锁定资本
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is trying to woo wealthy investors to one of its newest private market funds and keep them there with a rare offer — a bonus if they stick around for three years.】

item.title: 盖蒂博物馆为防火出售 5 亿美元债务
item.description: 加州最著名的艺术机构之一盖蒂美术馆正在向债券市场寻求 5 亿美元的资金，以帮助保护其杰作，因为加州正准备迎接又一个火灾频发的夏季。【原文：One of California’s most famed art institutions, the Getty, is turning to the bond market for $500 million to help preserve its masterpieces as the state prepares for another fire-prone summer.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行任命花旗银行的 Jurd 为欧洲工业业务主管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大皇家银行已聘请花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Royal Bank of Canada has hired longtime Citigroup Inc. dealmaker Rob Jurd as its head of industrial investment banking in Europe, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新日铁和激进派竞购卢特尼克美国钢铁公司
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）已成为决定美国钢铁公司未来的关键人物，上周他连续与竞购美国钢铁公司的竞争对手举行会谈。【原文：US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick has emerged as a key player in determining the future of United States Steel Corp., holding back-to-back meetings with rival bidders for the American steelmaker last week.】

item.title: 纽约市审计长称，马斯克的 DOGE 工作损害了特斯拉股东的利益
item.description: 纽约市主计长布拉德-兰德（Brad Lander）是纽约市五家养老基金的投资顾问，他指责特斯拉公司歪曲了首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在该公司的参与情况。【原文：New York City Comptroller Brad Lander, the investment adviser to the city’s five pension funds, accused Tesla Inc. of misrepresenting chief executive officer Elon Musk’s involvement in the company.】

item.title: 巴克莱重聘德意志银行肖特为西海岸赞助商
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）重新聘用了德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）董事总经理杰森-肖特（Jason Short），负责西海岸的金融赞助商，这家英国银行旨在加强其投资银行业务。【原文：Barclays Plc has rehired Deutsche Bank AG managing director Jason Short to cover West Coast-based financial sponsors as the British bank aims to bolster its investment banking efforts.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行获得加拿大银行执照，进军美洲市场
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）获得了加拿大银行执照，继续向美洲扩张。【原文：Banco Santander SA has won a Canadian banking license as it continues its expansion across the Americas.】

item.title: Meta 公司人工智能研究主管离职，投资热沸沸扬扬
item.description:
负责管理 Meta FAIR 集团的副总裁乔埃勒-皮诺（Joelle Pineau）将于 5 月离开公司

。【原文：

Joelle Pineau, the VP running Meta’s FAIR group, to depart company in May

】

item.title: 策略师下调 S&P 500 预测，但仍预计会反弹
item.description: 华尔街三位最可靠的牛市人士承认，他们对今年 S&P 500 指数的预期过于乐观，但他们仍然相信股市将在 2025 年剩余的三个季度中反弹。【原文：Three of Wall Street’s most reliable bulls have acknowledged that they were too optimistic in their estimates for the S&P 500 Index this year — but they still believe stocks will rally over the remaining three quarters of 2025.】

item.title: 如果美国设定中国船舶收费标准，Genco 将转移船只并转嫁成本
item.description: 这家美国最大的干散货托运人表示，如果美国对中国船只征收费用的建议生效，它准备将成本转嫁给美国出口商，或将船只停泊在其他地方。【原文：The largest US-based dry bulk shipper said it is prepared to pass on costs to US exporters or position its ships elsewhere if proposed US fees on Chinese ships go into place.】
